name: Samira Patel
persona: Samira is a third-year Psychology student who is passionate about understanding human behavior, though she sometimes struggles with time management and exam stress. Her CGPA reflects her ongoing effort to balance academic responsibilities with extracurricular interests. While she is determined to improve and sets moderate achievement goals, test anxiety occasionally affects her performance. Samira is resilient and motivated to finish her degree strong, seeking support from peers and campus resources to boost her academic confidence.
